body_html:
@bordingj As my debug log shows, the deadlock happened after runtime error was thrown. The main thread was waiting for traceback while the background threads were stuck in the ReadyQueue(function pop_back, csrc/autograd/engine.cpp). I guess there's something wrong with mutex there.
Log has been upload to gist.

@bordingj As my debug log shows, the deadlock happened after runtime error was thrown. The main thread was waiting for traceback while the background threads were stuck in the ReadyQueue(function pop_back, csrc/autograd/engine.cpp). I guess there's something wrong with mutex there.
Log has been upload to gist.
body:
@bordingj As my debug log shows, the deadlock happened after runtime error was thrown. The main thread was waiting for traceback while the background threads were stuck in the ReadyQueue(function pop_back, csrc/autograd/engine.cpp). I guess there's something wrong with mutex there.
Log has been upload to [gist](https://gist.github.com/peterjc123/52324c367f793294df03af165f5fe325).
